title: 451 30 "Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!"Transliteration: "Okose Saigo no Kiseki – Seigi no Mon o Toppaseyo" (Japanese:起こせ最後の奇跡 正義の門を突破せよ) Takahiro Imamura Yoshiyuki Suga May 16, 2010(2010-05-16)[36]
transformers_text: 451 30 Come Final Miracle Break Through the Gate of Justice Transliteration O kos e Saigo no Ki seki Sei gi no Mon o Top pas e yo Japanese Takahiro Imamura Yoshiyuki Suga May 16 2010 2010 05 16 36 Luffy and the rest of the prisoners make it on to the ship with the help of the whale sharks but the Gates of Justice are still closed and the ship is under attack by the rest of the Marine ships and Magellan plans on chasing down the escaping prisoners Mr 2 impersonates Magellan and manages to order that the gates be opened long enough to allow the prisoners ' ship to escape then immediately closed Luffy is upset to hear of Mr 2's staying behind but comes to accept that there is no other choice and thanks him over a miniature Transponder Snail Mr 2 stays behind to fight Magellan after he realizes what has happened as the other prisoners mourn his loss after passing through the Gates of Justice
tf_idf_text: come final miracle break gate justice transliteration ko saigo seki sei mon top pa japanese takahiro imamura yoshiyuki suga may luffy rest prisoner make ship help whale shark gate justice still close ship attack rest marine ship magellan plan chase escape prisoner impersonates magellan manage order gate open long enough allow prisoner ship escape immediately close luffy upset hear stay behind come accept choice thanks miniature transponder snail stay behind fight magellan realize happen prisoner mourn loss passing gate justice
